summary: Successfully tested all critical features: Registration, Login, Onboarding flow, Dashboard access, and TradingView EURUSD widget. All backend APIs working correctly (13/13 tests passed). Frontend UI flows verified via Playwright.
seed_data_creation: Created test user complete@test.com with completed onboarding for reusable testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All authentication and onboarding features working. TradingView widget integration confirmed working. Test credentials: complete@test.com / Test123! (user with completed onboarding)

feature_verification.LOGIN_new_users: ✅ WORKING - New users can login after registration
feature_verification.REGISTRATION: ✅ WORKING - Registration creates user and returns JWT token
feature_verification.ONBOARDING_redirect: ✅ WORKING - Users without onboarding are redirected to /onboarding
feature_verification.DASHBOARD_access: ✅ WORKING - Users with completed onboarding can access dashboard
feature_verification.TRADINGVIEW_EURUSD: ✅ WORKING - TradingView widget displays EURUSD chart on dashboard with real FXCM data

backend: User registration (/api/auth/register) - creates user, returns token
User login (/api/auth/login) - authenticates user, returns token with onboarding status
frontend: Login page loads with correct French UI
Registration form works - redirects to onboarding after success
Onboarding questionnaire flow - 6 steps working correctly
TradingView EURUSD widget visible on dashboard
User with completed onboarding goes directly to dashboard
Toast notifications working (Connexion réussie!, Compte créé avec succès!)

test_credentials.complete_user: complete@test.com / Test123! (onboarding completed, goes to dashboard)
test_credentials.new_registration: Any unique email with Test123! password works
